title: With John Vervaeke: Navigating the COVID Crisis with Faith, Beauty, and Glory
description:
John and I got together (on Zoom) for a free wheeling conversation about our work in the midst of this Covid19 pandemic. Notes below. 
Domicide

Covid 19

Religiosity and WWII

Everything was relative to our subjectivity

Not very deep, not very powerful resources, 

How spontaneously mythological thinking is emerging around this. 

Zak stein, the war on heaven on medium

Crisis krisis judgment

Barely implicit narrative that people have

The fool says in his heart there is no covid

Archetypal mythopoetic stuff

Crazy conspiracy theories, narrative order behind the chaos

Religious illiteracy that is exacerbating this

Capacity for a literate and wise response to the mythopoetic machinery

We are largely suffering it rather than making use of it. We need to reconsider what it is that our education is in the service of. 

Culture collapsed to the normativity of the market. The market isn’t the right machine. Behaving poorly in all of this. We need to understand to educating other normativities other than the market. 

Dialectic, dialogos project, the language that people were bringing to this trying to bring back, renew the use of religious terms. 



Faith is needed, what does faith mean

Descarte did something about subjectivity. Descarte equates soul and conscious mind. That moment where consciousness touches itself, you see the identifications take place, the sense of soul, what it is in Plato, as intermediary between , it’s the faculty that mediates between transcendence and immanence, 

New language. Moreness, an inexhaustible more-ness. Such-ness. Uniqueness to you, irreplacable to you. 

Tillich, moreness is a way of talking about the mystery we participate in, and the such-ness is the mystery of individuation. Always in a constant tension. The soul is the capacity that constantly mediates between them. 

Trying to get into right relationship with themself and reality. This way of talking is coming to the fore. 

Searching for lost faculties. Backgrounded, suppressed, marginalized.  

Faith as the wedding of emergence of mind to the emergence of world that affords right relationship

What is the faculty that does that. 

Spirit of geometry and the spirit of finesse

Three non-propositional P’s

The faculty of faith and finesse

Calvinism

Philia sophia

Reduce deception, deep connectedness

Soul, mediating tension

Cs lewis

The ontological argument

Secular version of the ontological argument

Two people can get to places they couldn’t get to on their own

Person is a bad translation Hypostasis
